mapper.select: SELECT holiday as holiday, hl_useyn as hl_useyn, description as description, crt_dt as crt_dt, crt_by as crt_by, upt_dt as upt_dt, upt_by as upt_by FROM givr.ax_ivr_holiday_gr ORDER BY holiday asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO givr.ax_ivr_holiday_gr (holiday, hl_useyn, description, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (#{holiday}, #{hl_useyn}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
